```bash
python -c "with open('database.py', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write('import sqlite3\\nfrom datetime import datetime\\nimport json\\n\\ndef save_problem(title, category, description, author, contact_info, is_anonymous=False, attachments=None):\\n    try:\\n        conn = sqlite3.connect(\"feedback.db\")\\n        cursor = conn.cursor()\\n        cursor.execute(\"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM problems\")\\n        count = cursor.fetchone()[0] + 1\\n        work_order = f\"NO.BI{count:012d}\"\\n        attachment_json = json.dumps(attachments) if attachments else \"[]\"\\n        cursor.execute(\"INSERT INTO problems (title, category, description, author, contact_info, is_anonymous, attachments, work_order, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)\", (title, category, description, author, contact_info, is_anonymous, attachment_json, work_order, \"å¾…å¤„ç†\"))\\n        problem_id = cursor.lastrowid\\n        conn.commit()\\n        conn.close()\\n        return True, problem_id\\n    except Exception as e:\\n        return False, str(e)\\n\\ndef get_all_problems():\\n    try:\\n        conn = sqlite3.connect(\"feedback.db\")\\n        cursor = conn.cursor()\\n        cursor.execute(\"SELECT * FROM problems ORDER BY created_at DESC\")\\n        problems = cursor.fetchall()\\n        conn.close()\\n        return problems\\n    except Exception as e:\\n        return []')"
```

```bash
python -c "with open('database_manager.py', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write('import sqlite3\\nimport json\\nfrom datetime import datetime\\nimport os\\n\\nclass DatabaseManager:\\n    def __init__(self, db_path=\"feedback.db\"):\\n        self.db_path = db_path\\n        self.conn = None\\n        self.cursor = None\\n    \\n    def connect(self):\\n        try:\\n            self.conn = sqlite3.connect(self.db_path)\\n            self.cursor = self.conn.cursor()\\n            return True\\n        except Exception as e:\\n            print(f\"æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¤±è´¥: {e}\")\\n            return False\\n    \\n    def disconnect(self):\\n        if self.conn:\\n            self.conn.close()\\n    \\n    def create_tables(self):\\n        try:\\n            if not self.connect():\\n                return False\\n            \\n            self.cursor.execute(\"\"\"\\n                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS problems (\\n                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\\n                    title TEXT NOT NULL,\\n                    category TEXT NOT NULL,\\n                    description TEXT NOT NULL,\\n                    author TEXT,\\n
```
